about_the_game:
The calm you feel watching fish swim.

Seeing them gracefully swim by, visions of a foreign world, somehow transplanted from the watery depths into a cube in your dentists office.

3 Years ago, we took that concept, and decided to bring that relaxation to anyone with a VR headset. And in this game, you can actually shrink down, and swim with the fishes. This is not an action game, there are no enemies, and you cannot die; instead, you are tasked with making the coolest fish tanks the world has ever known.

As you progress you will unlock several Unique fish tanks, all with there own unique fish and decorative items, including:

Freshwater
Swamp
Saltwater
Treasure
Scifi

With over 70+ Unique creatures! They are all real life animals, which you can learn about as you progress. You can get up close and personal with your favorite fish, and hand feed them. When they get too big, you can sell them for a bunch of cash and EXP to use for customizing your tank or buying new fish.

Everything about this game was built from the ground up for VR. In the fish tank, the player can swim with their hands, or use propulsion based Bubblejets to zip around.

We really focused on capturing the beauty of aquatic life, while giving the player full control of there interactions.

There are also minigames where you can interact with different fish, specific to each tanks inhabitants.

You will be able to walk around a simple hub world that is your house and small town; and you will unlock different fish tanks in different rooms of your house overtime. We have several NPC's with Voice acting and animation, but the real focus of the game is the fish and the fish tanks, and that is where you will be spending the majority of your time.

name: VR Fishtank

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: VR Fishtank is a relaxing VR game in which players can unlock and raise over 70+ aquatic creatures, create your dream aquarium, play minigames, and get up close and personal with your favorite fish!
